participant_1.background:
I'm single, and I enjoy cooking for myself.
i enjoy going to museums.
I'm proud of my sister and her growing family.
My favorite websites are about home improvement and computer programming.
I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that I'm proud of who I am and who I love.

participant_2.background:
My previous job was as a seamstress, and I used to love creating custom quilts for my customers.
I care about social media enough to stay connected with my friends but not enough to let it take over my life.
I live in my hometown right now, but I'm planning to move to Australia in the future.
I won a bowling tournament last year, and my CD collection is still safe.
I like cheeseburgers and doing laundry on weekends.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to create custom quilts. I used to work as a seamstress and I loved it.
I'm impressed! What kind of quilts do you make?

I've made quilts for every occasion - wedding quilts, baby quilts, memorial quilts, you name it. I love the creative process and it's so rewarding to see someone's face light up when they see the finished product.
That's really cool. I'm not very crafty, but I appreciate the work that goes into making quilts.
It's not as hard as it looks! There are a lot of great resources out there for beginners, and if you have a sewing machine, you can start making quilts right away.
I might have to look into that. Thanks for the tip!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about quilting.
Me too! I'm always looking for new hobbies to try.
What else are you interested in?
I like to cook, go to museums, and read.
I love to read too! What are some of your favorite books?
I like a lot of different kinds of books, but I'm always drawn to historical fiction. I love learning about different time periods and cultures.
Me too! I'm currently reading a book about the American Civil War.
Oh, that sounds interesting. I've never read a book about the Civil War.
It's really good. I'm learning a lot about the history of the war.
I might have to check it out. I'm always looking for new books to read.
You should! I think you'd like it.
